channel.title: Blogging on mikearagao
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on mikearagao

item.title: Hey Peeps!
item.description:
Hey! Hmm… This is weird! I am on the other side now.

Usually I’m reading the words of others but today it’s different. I’m actually feeling powerful. I can say whatever I want to almost everyone on the world… I just don’t get why I didn’t start this project before!
